Pre-Game Insights: Cade Cunningham scored 40 points in the Detroit Pistons' 119-105 victory over the Minnesota Timberwolves.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons have gone 8-8 at home.
The Trail Blazers have gone 4-14 away from home.
Others: The Pistons' 13.4 made 3-pointers per game this season are only 0.6 fewer made shots on average than the 14.0 per game the Trail Blazers give up.
TOP PERFORMERS: Cunningham is shooting 45.0% and averaging 24.1 points for the Pistons.
LAST 10 GAMES: Pistons: 7-3, averaging 115.0 points, 43.8 rebounds, 26.6 assists, 9.7 steals and 4.2 blocks per game while shooting 47.2% from the field.
